episodes.title: Reasoning
episodes.plot: With their new classes off to a bleak start, Vaibhav and his peers question the value of the IIT dream and seek inspiration from a trusted source.

episodes.title: Control System
episodes.plot: Struggling with Physics, Vaibhav attempts to bend the rules to attend Jeetu's classes. Meena frets that teenage hormones will get the best of him.

episodes.title: Atmospheric Pressure
episodes.plot: Jeetu searches for staff for his institute, making some reluctant choices along the way. Filled with self-doubt, Vartika evades practice tests at Aimers.

episodes.title: Repair & Maintenance
episodes.plot: When a bout of jaundice slows Vaibhav down in his studying, Jeetu insists he calls his only hope to get well quickly: his mother.

episodes.title: Packaging
episodes.plot: JEE results send Kota into celebration mode and give Vaibhav, Meena and Uday glimpses into their own futures, but the occasion comes with sad truths.
